page.title: 03RUARDEAN PRIMARY SCH. (GLOS)
page.content: I go to Ruardean School. Ruardean school is very old and has a nice view of Ruardean. We have acomputer and on it we play "Spacex" which is a game where you have to find parts of your spaceship. We do Maths, English, Science, History, Geography, Art, Games. We watch T.V. three times a week. We sometimes go for a walk and for trips. We are going to the Wilderness for three days. The Wilderness is a schools activities centre. The girls play netball and the boys play football. In the summer we play rounders and non stop cricket and other games. In our yard we have a netball court. We have a sports day every summer and we have a parent's sports evening every year.
